query.name: header
query.script:
select --Наименование избирательной комиссии case i.levelelcommittee when 'district' then --УИК (select ix.name from electcommittee ix where ix.idgasecom = i.idgasparecom) when 'territory' then --ТИК i.name end as name_ik,
case i.levelelcommittee when 'district' then --УИК (select COALESCE(c.surname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.middlename,'') from electcommittee ix, committeeman c, posts p where ix.idgasecom = i.idgasparecom and c.electcommitteeid = ix.id and p.id = c.postsid and upper(p.postprint) = 'CHAIRMAN' and ik.electdate >= c.postbegindate and c.postenddate >= ik.electdate) when 'territory' then --ТИК (select COALESCE(c.surname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.middlename,'') from committeeman c, posts p where c.electcommitteeid = i.id and p.id = c.postsid and upper(p.postprint) = 'CHAIRMAN' and ik.electdate >= c.postbegindate and c.postenddate >= ik.electdate) end as employer,
(select COALESCE(c.surname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.middlename,'')||', '||lower(p.name) from committeeman c, posts p where c.electcommitteeid = i.id and p.id = c.postsid and upper(p.postprint) = 'CHAIRMAN' and ik.electdate >= c.postbegindate and c.postenddate >= ik.electdate) as worker,
(select COALESCE(c.surname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.firstname,'')||' '||COALESCE(c.middlename,'') from committeeman c, posts p where c.electcommitteeid = i.id and p.id = c.postsid and upper(p.postprint) = 'CHAIRMAN' and ik.electdate >= c.postbegindate and c.postenddate >= ik.electdate) as worker2
from electcommincamp e, electcommittee i, electcampaign ik where e.id = ${id}::bigint and i.id = e.electcommitteeid and ik.id = e.electcampaignid ;
